transcript.text:
￼














Orders, Quotes & Customers


Website Customers
Import Customers

2 min
overview & purpose to avoid the hassle of adding customers one by one, you can directly import customers in bulk with import customers, options import customers using an excel sheet import customers importing customers is a simple 3 step process step – 1 download the file download an excel file from the ‘download file’ button the excel file downloaded comes with a sample customer entry this will help the admin in filling the excel sheet step – 2 fill up the data in this step, the system provides help to fill each column follow the rules and fill up sheet records highlighted with red color are mandatory to fill refer to the country, stores, user group and state tab for the codes step – 3 upload the excel after filling the excel upload the file using 'upload file' section the system validates for incorrect fields and lists down the invalid data
Did this page help you?
